description:
BlendMount and MirrorTap and HardTap product lines are designed and manufactured in the USA by J28 Design, Inc. When we designed the BlendMount for the Escort & Beltronics Radar Detectors, quality and adjustability were our main objectives. We wanted to utilize the dead space between the back of your mirror and the windshield for a stealthy mount with a factory-installed appearance. With the multiple adjustments we designed, the perfect placement of your radar detector can be achieved. Get rid of those failing/falling suction cups that act as Windshield Beacons for Thieves on the LookOut, and Clean Up your windshield with BlendMount !!! Also, SOLD SEPARATELY, is our MirrorTap Power Cord for your AUTO dimming mirror's wire harness (Amazon Item# B006MZFH28), and our HardTap 8' Hard Wire Kit (Amazon Item# B0062PO02Q). Say GoodBye to that Cigarette Lighter Power Cord  !!!  
BlendMount is not compatible with the following car manufacturers: Alfa Romeo, Aston Martin, Audi (being designed now), Bentley, Bugatti, Citroen, DMC, Fiat, Isuzu, Koenigsegg, Lotus, Maserati, McLaren, Mercedes Benz, Peugeot Renault, Rolls Royce, Saab, Suzuki, Tesla,Volvo.
title: Blendmount Beltronics / Escort Radar Detector Mount (EXCEPT Escort MAX). High Quality Custom Mount (BBE-2000,2001,2002,2003,2004,2005,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,or 2013)(Not Compatible with European Vehicles and C6 Corvettes)
